headline.kicker: CONNECTICUT Q & A: DR. CYNTHIA H. ADAMS

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: CYNTHIA H. ADAMS has been teaching health courses at the University of Connecticut in Storrs for 16 years and has counseled hundreds of students with eating disorders like anorexia nervosa and bulimia.
